thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: ignagr

author: ignagr
title: ignagr
text:
I received my order almost two weeks ago. I sent several emails to the customer service regarding missing items (all the 25 units of oneplus case, item 1069297), and they never answered. When I contacted them on chat, they keep telling me "wait 48 hours", extremely careless customer service. I begged them for a solution and they didn't even care. Beware this site, I clearly do not recommend them, they dont care about you and your money.
This is for order 23227011
